channel.title: How do i add new items in item.cfg?
channel.description:
How do i add new items that i have on Class8 (client) in my item.cfg to add stats???
When i do that :
item = 8890 Rune_Whip A_Rune_Whip. 10000 10000 15000 0 232 0 0 0 and the rest...
it crash when i try to open server...
But when i just pickup the item on the server i can see the rune whip.
What do i need to do?

item.title: How do i add new items in item.cfg?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“P I M P 3 D Tut, post:15, topic:266083”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=351308.msg2697752#msg2697752 date=1236385041]

[quote author=P I M P 3 D Tut link=topic=351308.msg2697652#msg2697652 date=1236383120]

any help please??? stop flaning
[/quote]Flanning? Maybe if you didn’t have the IQ of a chicken nugget you could figure this out yourself.

And you’re the one fucking telling me yesterday to shut up and stop flaming people even when I made the attempt to help.
[/quote]The person you attempted at helping had proper grammar and common sense.
But for our friend here; He has the IQ of a grasshopper.[/quote]

His problem was just as stupid as this one.

Read full topic
